meanings.definition: A beautiful young woman in Islamic paradise.
meanings.sent1: In Islamic paradise, believers are promised to be surrounded by houris.
meanings.sent2: The concept of houris is mentioned in the Quran.
meanings.sent3: The idea of houris in paradise always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her grace and beauty were like that of the houris in paradise.
meanings.sent5: The houris in Islamic paradise are described as pure and radiant beings.

meanings.definition: A group of beautiful women in Islamic paradise.
meanings.sent1: The Quran mentions the presence of houris as companions in paradise.
meanings.sent2: Believers look forward to meeting the houris in the afterlife.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a gathering of houris in paradise, what a sight it would be!
meanings.sent4: The group of houris in paradise symbolizes eternal bliss and happiness.
meanings.sent5: Legends speak of the houris in paradise as beings of unmatched beauty.
